homeTitle: Are You Looking For A Senior Freelance Frontend Developer?
homeSkill1: Support to build a complex web application or mobile app?
homeSkill2: A senior frontend developer with more than +{years} years experience?
homeSkill3: A T-shaped developer who has frontend expertise and cross-discipline competences in backend development, test engineering and DevOps?
homeSkill4: A developer who has a focus on high quality, clean, well-documented and easily maintainable code?
homeSkill5: A reliable, honest and professional partner to successfully finish your project in budget and time?
homeRightPlace: and you are in the right place!
shortSummary: German freelance software engineer with focus on Angular
detailedProjectList: if you want to have a detailed list of projects I have worked on in my professional career.
workedWith: I am proud to have worked with:
aboutParagraph: My name is Michael Hoffmann, I'm a freelance software engineer based in Munich/Germany. I hold a Masters in Electrical Engineering from the renown Technical University of Munich (TUM) and have {years}+ years of professional experience.
aboutParagraph2: I work for businesses of all sizes and have experience with both small and medium enterprises and corporates. In my career I have developed, maintained and launched multiple projects from scratch or improved an existing code base. Get in touch, if you like to receive a detailed list of projects I have worked on so far.
aboutParagraph3: Programming is my passion – but especially developing complex business applications both in frontend and in backend. I totally enjoy my work as a freelance developer and developing {privateProjectsLink} under the pseudonym Mokkapps. The reason why I write {blogLink}, {publicationLink} and work as Angular trainer for {angularArchitectsLink} is that I like to share my knowledge with others. Therefore, I also try to share most of my projects {gitHubLink}.
aboutParagraph4: If I do not invest my time in coding I'm usually playing video games or doing sports.
aboutParagraph5: Just contact me if you would like me to work for you.
aboutParagraph6: Visit Uses if you are interested in the software and hardware I use for software development.
whatIDo1: I specialize in building applications written in Angular (not AngularJS). I always develop them with your end-user in mind as this will also help you to meet your business goals
whatIDo2: I am interested in doing development work in backend & frontend applications
whatIDo3: I am reliable and honest to my customers and clients
whatIDo4: I produce high quality, clean, well-documented and easily maintainable code while respecting deadlines and budgets
whatIDo5: I use high code quality standards and static code analyzer
whatIDo6: I create beautifully responsive products which work cross a variety of devices and browsers
whatIDo7: I value accessible, valid and semantic HTML
whatIDo8: I use modernized CSS using Grid, Flexbox, and Animations
whatIDo10: I like strict typing in JavaScript, especially using TypeScript
whatIDo11: I like to write tests (unit, integration and end-to-end)
whoIWorkWithDesc: I enjoy working in a close relationship with international teams on-site. It is great fun for me to learn about new industries, especially if the product has a positive impact.
whatDontDoDesc1: Usually, I do not develop simple websites but am more interested in complex web applications or mobile apps.
whatDontDoDesc2: I can provide simple logos or help you pick typography or colors. In case you need further help with your brand, I am happy to connect you with a trusted graphic and brand designer.
newsletterInfo: Sign up for my newsletter! Hear first if I publish a new blog post and get regularly news from the software community.
mailChimpInfo: We use Mailchimp as our marketing platform. By clicking below to subscribe, you acknowledge that your information will be transferred to Mailchimp for processing
mailChimpInfoLink: Learn more about Mailchimp's privacy practices here.
